Html:
Hi, 

today I decided to install goblinXNA on my second pc. I followed the instruction and when i tried to run DominoGame, visual studio send me back this message:

"unable to load ALVARWrapper.dll, Impossible to find the module." I installed everything correctly, as a matter of fact the program works on my laptop.

best regard

 

salvo

There are several threads in this discussion that talk about the possible cause and solution, so please search them.

Ohan
